name: Montana Black Collective Missoula
category: African-American-owned Educational garden tours in Montana
description: A grassroots organization focused on social justice and Black activism in Missoula, dedicated to community support, cultural heritage protection, and personal growth development for persons of African ancestry. name: Blackfeet Tours
